title: Session End
description: Event emitted when the session is finished.

event.description: The event type. Always set to 'session_end'.

session_id.description: The unique if of this test session used to aggregate events together.

timestamp.description: The time when the session finished in ISO 8601 format.

exit_status.description: The status which pytest will return to the system. 0 means success, 1 means test failure, anything else is an error.
